boofcv.alg.shapes.polygon

Class RefinePolygonCornersToImage<T extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.alg.shapes.polygon.RefinePolygonCornersToImage<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RefineBinaryPolygon<T>

    public class RefinePolygonCornersToImage<T extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RefineBinaryPolygon<T>
    Given a contour and the index of corner points it will fit the corners individually to sub-pixel precision by locally fitting line segments near by each corner. The length of each line segment is specified by the number of pixels away it will traverse the contour. It makes sure that the end point does not go past the next corner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RefinePolygonCornersToImage

        public RefinePolygonCornersToImage(int endPointDistance,
                                   double cornerOffset,
                                   int maxLineSamples,
                                   int sampleRadius,
                                   int maxIterations,
                                   double convergeTolPixels,
                                   double maxCornerChangePixels,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> imageType)
        Configures all parameters of the detector
        Parameters:
        endPointDistance - How many indexes away in the contour list should end points be.
        cornerOffset - pixels this close to the corner will be ignored. Try 2
        maxLineSamples - Number of points along the line which will be sampled. try 10
        sampleRadius - How far away from the line will it sample pixels. ≥ 1
        maxIterations - Maximum number of iterations it will perform. Try 10
        convergeTolPixels - When the corner changes less than this amount it will stop iterating. Try 1e-5
        maxCornerChangePixels - maximum change in corner location allowed from previous iteration in pixels. Try 2.0
        imageType - Type of input image.

      • RefinePolygonCornersToImage

        Parameters:
        imageType - Type of input image.

      • pickEndIndex

        protected int pickEndIndex(int cornerS,
                           int dir)
        Selects the index to use as the end point. Makes sure that the index does not go past the next corner.
        Parameters:
        cornerS - index of corner in split list
        dir - Specifies which corner is next. can be -1 or 1.
